trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you get a new visit where the visitor reads through the entirety of a specific document.
This trigger fires when you create a new Space in DocSend.

trigger: New visit to a specific document
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time you get a new visit to a specific document.
This Trigger fires every time you get a new visit to any document.
